name: Feed The Plant
description:
You are an evil botanist. You have created a man-eating plant. Keep it alive for as long as possible.

How to play: You will be presented with a list of victims. Each turn, you pick one to feed to the plant.

  • The heavier the person you feed to the plant, the more its hunger will be sated.
  • As you feed the plant, it grows. The larger the plant, the hungrier it is.
  • Victims disappear from the list after two turns if not selected
  • After a victim is fed to the plant, their friends come looking for them. A person's popularity determines the number of friends they have.
  • When the hunger bar reaches all the way to the right, the game is over!
